originalText.text: Juliette has helped me move into 3 apartments and has been an absolute life saver. She is always so organized, friendly, and efficient in her work. I just moved last Thursday and my apartment already feels like home thanks to her help!

originalText.text: Juliette is an organizing and styling angel! Sheâ€™s also quite possibly the most efficient person on the planet. originalText.text: I can't thank you enough for the work you put in to achieve such a great result in our newly organized pantry. Every detail was a thoughtful choice on your part (styling too!) and I now know that in the future I will no longer be bogged down with time-consuming and frustrating searches. The labeling system for the categories is genius and so are the containers you chose to house them. Your professionalism, design knowledge, and love of orderly spaces are clearly the foundation for your approach to organizing - I will be so pleased to hire you again and to recommend you to all the friends who will drool over my wonderfully optimized pantry.
